```{.r .cell-code}
mpsz_sp
```

```{.r .cell-code}
dist <- spDists(mpsz_sp, 
                longlat = FALSE)
```

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
sz_names <- mpsz$SUBZONE_C
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
colnames(dist) <- paste0(sz_names)
rownames(dist) <- paste0(sz_names)
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
distPair <- melt(dist) %>%
  rename(dist = value)
head(distPair, 10)
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
distPair %>%
  filter(dist > 0) %>%
  summary()
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
distPair$dist <- ifelse(distPair$dist == 0,
                        50, distPair$dist)
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
distPair %>%
  summary()
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
distPair <- distPair %>%
  rename(orig = Var1,
         dest = Var2)
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
write_rds(distPair, "data/rds/distPair.rds") 
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
distPair <- read_rds("data/rds/distPair.rds")
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
odbus <- read_csv("data/aspatial/origin_destination_bus_202210.csv")
```
